Simply Earth: Hi Earthie! This is Sarah. Thanks for signing up via text! Use code UNICORN to get a free unicorn diffuser with your 1st Recipe Box! https://simplyearth.attn.tv/aOROvSuIh2uL 

Have any questions? Reply here!
Simply Earth: We pride ourselves on our customer service. Save our contact in your phone and text us whenever you have a question about the Recipe Box!
Why can't I call customer service?
Simply Earth: You can call us at 866-330-8165, Monday to Friday, 7am-3pm CST. Let me know if I can assist you via text, it may be faster.
It's not 3pm cost and they are hanging up on me right now
Cst
I'm getting very upset
I'm  trying to sign into my account however I can't because I don't remember my password or never set up a password
Great they hung up on me until they turned on the closed message
This instills great confidence in your company and how you treat your customers
Template used: "Check spam - All brands"; last updated: 2023-10-10 16:43:53.913

Simply Earth: I'm really sorry about this. I'm afraid it's past 3 PM CST now. You may try to contact us again once business hours resume. In the meantime, have you tried clicking the "Forgot Password" option on the sign-in page? Please check your spam and promotions folders, as our emails may sometimes land there. Let me know how it goes!

Are there deals on/Is there a discount on Snoo rental
Happiest Baby: You can use the SAVE20EMAIL-1114 coupon for $20 off orders of $199+ on Basic Rental at happiestbaby.com. Check the website for more deals!

How do I add that to my existing order?

Also - how don track my order? Meaning where is the Snoo and my other order - and when can I expect them? My baby is coming and I need it asap!

Also - I'm supposed to have free Premium App Subscription. 

Why won't the app let me log in? It's asking for more money

Happiest Baby: Regarding applying the discount code to your current order, the best way for us to support you is to contact us through this link: https://happiestbaby.attn.tv/a867DNFGs_kv. Our team will be happy to assist you!

I can see that your order is on its way. Our orders ship quickly, and you will receive tracking information via email as soon as it ships. Please be sure to check your spam and promotions folders, as our emails sometimes end up there.

Please note that orders are processed quickly and sent out to families right away. Orders ship within 2 business days of your selected ship date. Purchase orders typically spend up to 5 business days in transit, while rental orders take 3 to 7 business days in transit. Please allow an additional 2 to 3 business days for Alaska and Hawaii. You can also select a ship date up to 4 months in advance.

Regarding the Premium App Subscription, I will check this with my team. May I please have your email address?

important: Ask the cx to share their order number and email before providing personal or order-specific information such as:
send_to_cs: Send to CS for all shipping issues
escalate: If cx's mention pregnancy or infant loss, a grieving mother, or the incident with Brooklyn and Baby Rocky, DO NOT RESPOND. You can ESC these cases when needed without responding to the cx
Do NOT answer Premium App inquiries, ESC immediately
ESC when cx is looking for a supervisor
ESC when cx come back after emailing the CS team & haven't received a response
ESC any questions about the SNOO Sack inner bands (across the belly and the leg flap)
ESC in case the cx is asking if a product was discontinued
tone: Always type SNOO in all caps
Keep messages concise and not too long
Don't say the SNOO is an "Investment", say "Premium product"
templates: For questions about future promos, sales or deals, use FUS shortcut
If there is no promo available for accessories use NPA shortcut
If cx can't connect SNOO to the app use CCA shortcut
If a product is on sale include that info when you use PTE shortcut
If cx says they're planning to purchase SNOO, use PGS shortcut
If cx are asking for items that we don't sell, use IDS shortcut
If cx are asking about refund for 6 month special, use PRR shortcut
If cx ask what is our return policy:
âžœ Ask them which item they're referring to first
âžœ Then send the correct information
dos_and_don_ts: Never refer them to check the website for more info on promotions or sales
Always provide the actual date and time the sale ends. If there's none available use the LMO shortcut
Don't send links for The Lola Crib, it's not available anymore
Share expedited shipping information where applicable
We don't have a buyback program available. There is no need to mention the donation email as this program is now closed.
Tell cx that as a member of the HB text fam community, they will receive alerts about future promotions first
drive_to_purchase: Don't recommend SNOO accessories unless SNOO was already purchased.

Always share the full price and highlight if there is a running promotion. For ex: "SNOO at full price is $1695 but this weekend we are running a promotion of 20% of SNOO + FREE gifts, which makes SNOO $1356!"
promo_and_promo_exclusions: The client does NOT offer special discount codes for foster parents/parents of foster children, share standard discounts with cx who inquire about this if they are eligible
The military discount CAN NOT be applied to rentals, only to new SNOO purchases
When sharing codes with cx/troubleshooting errors - explain the promo code terms
Don't tell customers that the code can't be applied to an item - instead inform them that it CAN only be applied to certain products
We do not offer a discount specifically for multiple SNOOs
